name: CL_QANSWER_FAMILY_MEMBERS
description: This table stores information about the patient's family members that they entered when filling out their family history.

columns.name: ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the answer record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FAM_MEM
columns.description: The unique identifier of the patient's family member with regards to their family history.

columns.name: MSG_CALLER_REL_C_NAME
columns.description: The family status relationship category ID for the patient.

columns.name: FAM_MEM_NAME_OR_ALIAS
columns.description: Patient-created identifier to help the patient differentiate between their family members when filling out their family history.

columns.name: FAM_MEM_REMOVE_YN
columns.description: Tracks if the associated family member (HQA related group 600) has been requested to be removed from the patient's family history by the user.
